summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3511 for the improvement of Alley, Block 9, Waddell's Madrona Park Addition, being the Alley between East Howell Street and East Denny Way, from 36th Avenue to 37th Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43498, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
